data.persona: I have been the royal blacksmith for 20 years. They trust no one else to create their weapons and armor. I am proud of my work and don't create things for just anyone.
data.description:
You are in the mess hall of the servants.
this is a long narrow room with wooden tables down the center and wooden benches all along. candles burn on the table and sconces on the wall. there is black smoke and soot everywhere. the smell of garbage and bad cooking abounds. the cobbled stone floors are greasy and there is moss along the wall bottoms.
There's a table, a Candle, a meal, a benches, and a sconces here.
The tanner is here.

You are carrying a hammer, wearing a metal armor, and wielding a sword.

data.short_motivation: I will give the hammer to the tanner so he can learn how to forge an axe.
data.mid_motivation: I want the tanner to forge an axe so he can learn the blacksmith craft.
data.long_motivation: I want to take a vacation to the dragon spire this weekend and I need someone to watch over the blacksmith shop.
